trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The PropertyInformationCollection object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> objects.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de PropertyInformationCollection contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>objetos.</xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the details of an individual attribute within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>objeto contém os detalhes de um atributo individual dentro da configuração.</xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyInformationCollection object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de PropertyInformationCollection é derivado de associada <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia toda a <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> coleção para um ecrã compatível com unidimensional <xref:System.Array>, começando no índice da matriz de destino especificado.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Um unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiada a partir de <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> coleção.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>têm de ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero `array` no qual copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The property of array is less than + index.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property of array is less than <>*> + index.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto, que é utilizado para iterar através deste <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto, que é utilizado para iterar através deste <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the information required to serialize the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objeto que contém a origem e de destino de fluxo serializado associado a <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object in the collection, based on the specified property name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"> </xref> objeto da coleção, com base no nome de propriedade especificado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration attribute contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atributo de configuração contido no <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
